order.sql: INSERT INTO web_trade_order_history_krw_etc(od_action,od_pay_status,od_pay_po_ids,od_market_price,od_total_cost,mb_no,mb_id,od_temp_coin,od_fee_rate,od_receipt_coin,od_receipt_fee,od_reg_ip)VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,(SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(ABS(po_point)),0),2) FROM fns_trade_point.web_point_krw WHERE mb_no=?),?,?,?)

cancel.sql: UPDATE web_trade_order_history_krw_etc SET od_pay_status=?, od_cancel_dt=NOW() WHERE od_pay_status<>'OK' AND od_id=? AND mb_no=? limit 1

tradehistory.sql: SELECT od_action,od_pay_status,od_pay_po_ids,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_receipt_fee,od_receipt_avg,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_dt FROM web_trade_order_history_krw_etc WHERE (od_pay_status='OK' OR (od_pay_status='CAN' AND od_receipt_coin!=0.00000000)) AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_receipt_dt DESC, od_id DESC LIMIT ?,?

tradeopenhistory.sql: SELECT od_id,od_action,od_pay_status,od_market_price,od_total_cost,od_temp_coin,od_receipt_coin,od_reg_dt,od_receipt_avg,od_receipt_dt FROM mem_open_order_krw_etc WHERE (od_pay_status='REQ' OR od_pay_status='WAIT' OR od_pay_status='PART') AND mb_no=? ORDER BY od_id DESC limit ?,?
